June 19, 2010 D West of England Bandsmen's Festival (Championship Section)

Un Vie de Matelot (A Sailor's Life)
Molinnis Park, Bugle, Cornwall, England, UK Best Player: Kayleigh Rowe, cornet, Camborne Town
Best Soprano: Les Kneebone, Camborne Best Solo Cornet: Kayleigh Rowe, Camborne Best Euphonium: Robert Jose, Camborne Best Solo Horn: Rachel Sargent, St Dennis Best Set of Basses: Camborne B (1st Section)
